title: missing quests
body: Since the update i read that other people got quests for essence and the compelemtary 1350rp skin but i don't have any of those but i bought runes and pages (with rp) before , but even worse i did not get the daily win quest since the update. Anyone in the same boat as me?

replies.body: I checked this out for you and I see one rune page purchase and some greater runes, but they were after the September 1st cut off date.  In this case, the account wouldn't have received a capsule mission or a skin because it was over the cutoff.  Sorry about that!

Yeah I have 20 rune pages my smurfs got the missions and my main didn't get the skin missions lol... and I am missing some BE that I should have gotten.

E: I've seen a couple other ppl with the problem so you are not alone.
